claimReturn(address).details: Claim the return amount of the specified address.

params._user: The address to query the claim return amount of.

claimReturn(address).return: Flag, if 0:cannot claim, 1: Already Claimed, 2: Claimed

endMarket().details: Settle the market, setting the winning option

getEndingPrice().details: Get price of provided feed address*

getReturn(address).details: Gets the return amount of the specified address.

params._user: The address to specify the return of

getReturn(address).return: returnAmount uint256 memory representing the return amount.

params._maxValue: The maximum value of neutral option range.
params._minValue: The minimum value of neutral option range.
params._startTime: The time at which market will create.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

placePrediction(uint256,uint256).details: Place prediction on the available options of the market.

params._option: The option on which user placed prediction.
params._stakeAmount: The amount staked by user at the time of prediction.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
